const response = await client.search({
  size: 0,
  aggs: {
    sales_per_month: {
      date_histogram: {
        field: "date",
        calendar_interval: "month",
      },
      aggs: {
        sales: {
          sum: {
            field: "price",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    avg_monthly_sales: {
      avg_bucket: {
        buckets_path: "sales_per_month>sales",
        gap_policy: "skip",
        format: "#,##0.00;(#,##0.00)",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
